div.p: Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij die aprilis

The saide day it was Statut' and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis
consale and Communite for the Sayftie and weilfair' of the tone' that
the wache be set nichtlie at sex houris and euere man sal ansuer'
for his seruandis and thai sal entir at Sex yeris houris and quhay
entiris nocht tharto the saide hour befor the officiaris sal pay ij s' to
fee ane for him that nicht Alsua that quha beis fundin sclepand'
his ax and his vmast clath salbe eschet and his persone put in the
goif fra that tyme to the next Setting of the nev wache
and nocht outakin of the saide goif for prayr' price no Request

Item the saide day the aldirman balyeis Consal and communite grantit
to mak thar' foss' and dikis at the nesche for the Sayfte of the
tone

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die
aprilis quo Supra

The saide day comperit Elizabetht vocat sistir to vmquhile sere
alexander vocat chaplane and Elizibetht pyot Sistir douchtir to the
saide sere alexander and tua of his ayris quhilkis of thar avne fre wile
and motyve maide constitut and ordanit William Colp burges of the
said' burghe thar verray lauchful procurator' Irreuocabil' actour' and
factour' with pouer to Substitut vndir him ane and may to rais'
and Impetret' breuis of Inquest of our Souerane lordis chapell of the
landis quhilkis the saide sere alexander deit westit and Sesit as of fee
to be directit to the aldirman and balyeis of abirdene the samyn to mak
deulie proclamit seruit and retourit the saide chapell lettres of Sesin
to ask and rais' possessione' of lauchful Sesin tharof to tak and entir with
our' Selis to ger mak and chartiris heretablie to the saide William to caus'
be maid' with him his ayris or' assignez' in fre heritage to reman
as plane chartiris of Sesin proportis one the souerast wys' can be
diuisit be the said' William his ayris or assignez' and to seile ale
chartiris and writis with our selis concerning the said' landis that the said William
his ayris or assignais thinkis spedfull to him and quhatsumeuir personis
and frelie to sell annaly to dispone apon thar part of the said landis et cetera in thar
namys but ony Reuocacion And to the kepin' of the quhilkis thai committit the gret
bodelie aithis one thar avne fre will the ewangil' expremit and neuir to cum in the
contrar' vndir the panys' of mansuering Infamite and Inhabitate foreuire
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die aprilis

the saide day It was Statutit ordanit and deliuerit be ane suorne
assis' Jonhne Colisone forspekar that the baxtaris sal baik xlviij
vnce of welbakin and boutit Ry breide for ij d' and xxiiij vnce
for j d' / Ande gif Richerd' redheid' or ony vthir baxtar bakis evile
Stuf Raw or vnboutyte Sal pay xx s' to Sanct nicholes
werk vnforgevin

Eodem die Robertus Kintor fuit in amerciamento Curie per assisam ex ore
Johannis Colisone prelocutoris pro perturbio mathei branche Et Idem
matheus amerciatur pro perturbio ipsius Robertj et quilibet alteri emendabit
ut iura volunt Insuper diliberatum per dictam assisam ex ore prefati
Johannis quod dictus matheus restaurabit et diliberabit cacabum eidem
Roberto

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne
Colisone forspekar that Jonhne malisone salbe obeit in the pece
of lande liande in the nethirkirkgate eftir the tenor' of his evidentis
bocht fra Canny Walcar and marion' Walcar' nochtwithstand the saide
Jonhne sal nocht Inquiet the wyf of Robert bonatmakar tharintill
vnto the tyme that he byg
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die aprilis quo supra

The saide day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman and consale for
the eschevin of the Infirmitez cumin out of franche and strang' partis that
ale licht weman be chargit and ordanit to decist fra thar' vicis
and Syne of venere and al thar' buthtis and housis Skalit and thai to pas'
and wirk for thar Sustentacion vndir the payne of ane key of het
yrne one thar chekis and thar bannysone of the tone'

head.add: the feing of the mastir masone

div.p:
The saide day mastir lanslat mastir masone has conducit and feit
him personalie with the aldirman and Counsale In the tovnis nayme to
Remane with thame at thar werk for tua yeris immediatlie to be
runnyn and complet fra the next Witsonday hereftir follouing and to wirk
continualie in thar' seruice of masone Craft in the vpmakin and
bigyne of thar' queir' and kirk werk dalie to wirk mak
mvldis hew and lay with his avne handis within the tone and Colly
als' lang and als' oft as he beis chargit be the mastir of the
werk Ande Sustene and vphalde the saide werk in al pontis
according to ane mastir masone to do in wirking ourseing helpin
and furthiring of the masonnis and seruandis of the saide werk and
the saide mastir lanslat salbe leile ayfald' and trew to the saide
werk and Reman continualie at the samyn and sal nocht pas' tharfra for
nay Request prayer' price nor leyf forthir thane he may pas'
in the morning and cum hame agan tile his bede at evin Ande to
the keping and fulfilling of al thir pontis befor writin the saide
mastir lanslat has Suorne the gret bodely aithe and oblist
be the fathtis of his bodie the haly ewangil' expressit for
the quhilkis the saide tone and Communite sal content and pay to
the saide mastir lanslat Ilkan monetht xxxv s' for his fee

head.add: Anent the Infirmiteis' to be eschevit

div.p:
The saide day It was ordanit and deliuerit be the aldirman ande
Consale that Dauid liell and ale vthiris personis Infekit
with this Strangis seknes be Remouit and expellit out of
the tone for the eschevin of the saide Seknes and sayfte
of the Samyn et cetera and thar' durris closit

The xxviij day of aprile the yer' forsaide sere Jonhne ruthirfurde
knicht aldirman exponit and Schew to the consal how the tone was
vndir Summonce be diuers' partiis beseking thame to provide for
expensis to the defens' of the Samyn considerand' thar' common'
gudis was exponit And' atour the aldirman deliuerit in his
Compt' of his expensis of the termes of martimes bigan
and Witsonday next to Cum extending to xix li' and j d'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem octauo quinto
die mensis maij anno quo Supra

The saide day comperit gilbert fache and In the name of Robert
glenmaluyn his gude Sone he protestit Solemptlie that
the manuring and occupacion of the forlande pertening to vmquhil'
murdow glenmaluyn his fadir and now to him be heritage without
tak of him be Robert of Cullane and al vthiris turne him
nocht to nay preiudice and for Costis and Skathtis et cetera

The saide day the aldirman balyeis and diuers' of the communite
and thir personis of Counsal vndir writin warnit be the handbell throw
the haill toune Representande the body of the tone' that was present and coud'
be comprehendit for the tyme that is to say Alexander menyes Robert blinsel David'
menyes alexander Rede thomas prat Jonhne Wormet Androw Cullane yongar gilbert
menyeis Androw murray eldar alexander gray Richerd' Waus Dauid mathison'
Jonhne Waus mathow branche george bysset James Craik Johne Retre patrik
rede and Richerd hill yongar grantit and gaf to mastir androw Craufurde for his gude
seruice done and to be done within thar parys' kirk of Sanct nicholes the first
perpetuale chaplainry or seruice that happinnis to vaik being at thar' disposicion
of the profit and availe of tene markis or within the valour of tene markis
be yer' the saide mastir Androw doing tharfor dyvin seruice as efferis eftir the
tenor' of the fundacion' of the Samyn

The saide day aldirman balyeis and personis befor Inmediatlie writin representand' the body
of the tone opinlie warnit be the handbel of thar fre motywe wile and deliuer
ance grantit and gaf to sere Jonhe Stirueling thar' common' clerk for
his gude seruice done to tham the first perpetuale cheplanry or seruice being'
at thar' gyst exceding tene markis be the yer' the saide sere Johne
doing' dyvine seruice tharfor eftir the tenor' of the fundacion of the samyn say
that the saide sere Johne gif to mastir androw crafurd' perpetual chaplanry
or seruice of tene markis be the yer' Ande gif the saide sere Jonhne happinnis
to Refus' the saide cheplanry to be vteuche the Realme or veseit out
of this warld' as god forbed' thane the saide mastir Androw sal haue
the Samyn ale the dais of his lyve he doing tharfor dyvine seruice attour
to the fundacion of that verk

The viij day of maij the yer forsaid' the aldirman balyeis
and Consale present for the tyme at the woman hill for vphaldin
of the ald' louabile Consuetud' honor Consalacion and plesour
of this burghe' lik as has bene vsit in tymez of thar' wourthie
and honorabil' progenitoris chesit thomas leslie and Robert of Cullane
coniunctlie abbatis and priour of bonacord' tile vys' and excerce the
saide office this Instant yer and grantit to pay thame v merkis
of the common' gudis this tyme tuelf monetht

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem octauo die
maij quo Supra

The saide day Canny leis was in ane amerciament of the Court for the strubulance
of Androw chamer and to amend as law wile and forber' in tym to Cum and
the saide Androw was conuikit for strubulance of hir' in word for the
Amendis of the saide Offence and strubulance It was deliuerit and ordanit
that the saide Agnes sal pay tua merkis to Sanct nicholes
werk vnforgevin Ande gif euire scho dois ony w strubulance
tile ony persone and beis conuikit tharintill scho salbe declarit common'
and pvnist tharfor eftir the forme of law Ande atour thai ordanit the saide
agnes to Syt done one hir kney and ask the saide Androw forgyvnes

The saide day canny leis was in ane amerciament of the court for strubu
lance of the court and to amend' as law wil' and forber' in tym
to cum

add.foreign: penes electionem commissariorum ad assedacionem duorum Rethium aque de furdis

div.p:
The saide day the aldirman balyeis Consal and diuers' of the
Communite Representand' y the body of the haill toune warnit be the hand'bell throw the haile tone with ane
consent and assent grantit and ordanit tile Set and formale tua
nethis fyschingis of the furdis one the wattir of Dee maile fre
and girssome fre for aucht yeris Inmediatlie to be runnyn eftir the
completing of thar generale assedacion Instant' Ilkan half nethis
for sextene markis to be rasit and vptakin for the defens' of the
landis of the crovis the Summonce Rasit apon the haile tone
tharapone / ane vthir summonce rasit be patrik gordone anent the
clame of mastir Androw Cadouis fyschingis ane vthir summonce
Impetrat' be bessy Setone and for the reperacion and mending
of the Organis et cetera Ande chesit thir personis commissaris that
is to say sere Jonhne' ruthirfurd' aldirman Robert blinsel Dauid menyeis'
Jonhne of Cullane Jonhne Colisone thomas prat and Jonhne Wormet
to Sett the saide ande to formaile latt the said' tua nethis
fyschingis for the said' termes and ordanit ane commission' to be mad'
vndir thar' commone Sele tharapon' apone the quhilkis the aldirman askit
at me sere Jonhne Stirueling notar and common' clerk Instrument witnes
the saide personis and Dauid mathesone James Colisone gilbert menyes and
vthir diuers'

Eodem die assignatur Johanni Colisone ad probandum restam suj nobilis anglicanj
extra xx s' solut' Sponse patricij chernsid' feria quinta sexta proximo futuro

add.foreign: penes assedacionem duorum rethium de furdis

div.p:
the saide day the aldirman In the name and commavnd' of the tone perofferit
to the takismene and assedacionaris of the furdis that hede pouer to
pay formaile for the saide tua nethis for aucht yeris termes quhilkis personis
warnit lauchfullie and comperit refusit to tak ony of the
said' takis vpon' the quhilkis the aldirman askit Instrumentis befor the
witnes writin in the ak obefor maid' tharapone Inmediatlie

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij die maij
quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman balyeis Consal and diuers' of the
Communite of this burghe' present for the tyme grantit the office of
Segirsting to William gibsone for ane yer'

The saide day James hair was in ane amerciament of the Court be ane suorne
assis' alexander rede forspekar for the dissent done agane the common' profit of
the haile tone and for to amend as law wile and forber' in tym to Cum

The saide day the aldirman and the Consal present for the tyme grantit
to pay to sere Robert Waus tene pundis this yer to Cum for his
gude seruice to be maid' to the tone within thar parys' kirk as
efferis ane Sangstar to do
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die maij quo supra

Eodem die thomas gall Richardus rollande Willelmus ros' et Willelmus
prig accusati pro perturbio burgi sub Cilencio noctis / pro vigilacione
Illicita in burgo tempore prohibito a Jure ac quilibet pro perturbio alterius
Et alexander pardonar' accusatur pro perturbio dicti Willelmi prig
